import React from "react"; // import Button from "./loginbutton"; import LoginFront from "./loginfront"; import ReactCardFlip from "react-card-flip"; import SignupBack from "./signupback"; import SignupFront from "./signupfront"; class LoginBack extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { isFlipped: false, }; this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); } handleClick(e) { e.preventDefault(); this.setState((prevState) => ({ isFlipped: !prevState.isFlipped })); } render() { return (
WELCOME BACK!

LOGIN WITH EMAIL

Forgot Your Password?

); } } export default LoginBack;
